title: Button spamming glitch
body: My game is not letting me open the leaderboard or ESC menu in game, my left click also does not work. If I were to left click it would just ping. I cannot use any abilities in game as if my keyboard were disabled. When I press ESC the game will then tab me out. I have no idea what happens when this occurs but it requires me to sign in and sign out of windows. When I panic and mash QWER or if I spam an emote this most often happens. However, it does occur randomly at times. If anyone has a solution it would be greatly appreciated, this is incredibly frustrating when I'm in a game especially if it's late game and I cannot use any abilities. It's like having an afk at the most crucial point in the game where one person missing can mean definitive a win or loss.

replies.body:
Something might have gone wrong with your configuration files for those hotkeys to stop functioning correctly. Let's go through and try manually resetting those to see if that helps. Follow these steps, and let me know how it helps!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
